name: Space Bubble Shooter
description:
Shoot bubbles, match colors and solve 400 addictive levels in this fun bubble shooter game for everyone. With physics effects and trance music.

It is the most original bubble shooter game for Android with a special twist - it uses a physics engine to make the puzzles even more entertaining. Now with magnetic bubbles that distort gravity, rainbow bubbles and meteorites.

Features 11 brilliant episodes with over 400 levels in total and 75 levels in new Challenge mode.

Powered by libGDX and box2D.
